Turning her rear to face the mirror, she found her white crack stained dark, and small flecks of fecal matter scattered across her petite bottom. Gasping in horror, she looked towards the toilet--
-- To find only an empty roll sitting placidly on the holder.
She flung open the cupboard below the sink, only to find it empty save for a bottle of drain cleaner and a few boxes of soap.

Looking at the counter by the sink, Rarity saw two things: a book of songs written by her dear sister Sweetie Belle, and a pearl white hair towel with the words 'My Faithful Student' embossed in gold, which had been forgotten by Twilight during a sleepover at the boutique. Using either of these would be breaking the trust of the pony to whom these things belonged, and she briefly considered simply continuing about her day with the mess still present, but if any of her friends saw her, it'd surely be a one-way ticket to the mental ward of Ponyville Hospital.
Does she...
122.title: Head straight to the bathroom (More gas/scat)

choices: Eat a little bit of the food. Fight it!
Eat a little more than usual. The harm can't be too bad.
Screw it! Eat it all! I'm hungry!
1223.content: Rarity decided to take a deep breathe, as her friend Twilight would do, and tried to think. She then thought that maybe she should just let it sly. In fact, she may not even go out today. Little did Rarity know, this was the spell talking. She was becoming lazier and actually less concerned with her hygiene. Rarity's stomach growled furiously, before letting out a massive PRRRRRRT!! She decided to get something to eat. She looked in her fridge, to be introduced to a lot of food she had been stocking up on lately. She really wanted to watch her figure, but she felt so hungry! Hungrier than usual! She decided to...
1223.title: Eh, it's not so bad...

124.content:
"Hm, I've got a few free hours. Might as well watch television," Rarity said, setting down her bags and heading for the living room. She plopped down on the sofa and switched on her expensive curved screen TV. A few channel flips later, she had found her favorite program.

"Ah, Photo Finish's Fashion Fiesta," She said, leaning against the armrest as the show began.

As she watched models strut across the stage in the newest designer clothes, Rarity failed to realize just how badly she smelled after all that exertion. She shifted in her seat, a tuba-like fart ripping out. "Truly, this is the pinnacle of entertainment."

A tangy odor drifted from Rarity's pits, but she didn't notice as she was fully enraptured by the show. Slowly, a thick miasma of BO rose from her body and permeated the room. The stink sunk into every porous surface, turning the curtains, the rug, and the sofa into sickly carriers of her filthy scent. Dark circles appeared between her legs and her body. A line of yellowish sweat appeared on the cushion beneath her ass, forever staining it with her eggy ass stink.

Eventually, however, the show ended, and the full brunt of her stench hit her nose. "Egads! What is that horrible smell?!" She shouted, throwing up her hooves in surprise. A quick sniff confirmed; It was her. "But I just showered this morning! Nevermind. Right now I should really...
124.title: Watch TV (Body odor)

choices: ...Work off some stress by jogging." (Sweat/Body Odor)
...Get a bite to eat, all this thinking has me exhausted." (Weight Gain)
...See what soas are on today." (Further Brain Drain/Weight Gain)
14.content:
Rarity picks up her equipment and sits at her table, drawing out her blueprint for the dress and cutting fabric for it. As she cuts the first piece, her telekinetic grip falters, scissors falling to the floor as the mare feels a light, cottony sensation in her head. She whines quietly as she rubs a hoof on her sore horn, taking a fleeting moment to rest it and contemplate the nature of this sudden charlie-horn.

"Oh dear. I do hope that I didn't rush too much this last week and put myself through any undue stress..." she murmurs to herself, picking the scissors up again and returning to her work. While her levitation works fine, she struggles to remember the shape she's supposed to cut the fabric in. I believe this part is shaped like a pent...pentago....uhm...oh damn it all, I can't remember the word. Her face scrunches up as she glances at the blueprints, the text scrambling around as she strains to get its measurements.

A few minutes of cutting and she leaves her workshop in a frustrated huff. "I can come up with better plans, right now I need to..."
14.title: A little empty-headed (Intelligence drain)...

choices: Her gut's unceasing protests (More Weight Gain)
Another, more profound loss of mental acuity (Brain Drain)
142.content:
Rarity feels a loud gurgle in her midsection as she walks to the kitchen of her home, immediately opening the refrigerator and taking out some fresh strawberry yogurt. She wastes no time in spooning out the small cup and licking the container clean, a small stain of pink painting her chin as she feels her instincts take over. In her mind, what mattered was not whether she caught anypony's attention, nor whether she kept clean, but whether she got her fill - and right now, she couldn't be farther from full.

She pulls out more yogurt, but within a minute cleans it out without even using her spoon, licking it clean and swallowing every last bit of the dairy as she lets out a soft belch. "Oof," she grunts as she recovers from the belch, the act of release uncouth, yet....oddly satisfying to her. She sits on her flanks in front of the open fridge, placing a hoof on her belly as her mind seems to return to her. While she was originally quite lithe and light on her hooves, now she has a small pouch of bellyfat, almost imperceptible while sitting but capable of sagging a few millimeters or jiggling in sudden movements. Her cheeks don't feel quite as well-sculpted as before, her jaw padded slightly in a way that makes it a bit slower to open and close her mouth. Her flanks, while still not 'fat' per se, are definitely thicker, fuller than before.

As a mare of stature and beauty, Rarity takes notice of these slight changes, feeling almost pathetic for indulging enough to gain these few pounds. Had two pudding-cups of yogurt really done this much to her? How could it be so? Suddenly she remembers the fat unicorn she had encountered in her rushing, face feeling somewhat pale as she feels her self-confidence shrinking. "I...I-I don't understand...what did her spell do? Does every calorie I eat simply become fat now? I....I need to do something about this. I don't know what, but I'd best do s-something!"

In this moment of lucidity, Rarity notes a new feeling:
142.title: ...Get a bite to eat, all this thinking has me ...

choices: "Goodness Rarity, what happened to your decorum!?"
1421.content:
The gurgling of her needy middle grows somewhat more intense as she licks and summarily wipes her nose clean of yogurt. The yogurt was not quite satisfying for her hunger, but in this moment, she shouldn't seek to fill up wholly.

She stands back up on all fours before, without warning, her tail lifts and lets loose a soft sputtering gust of flatus. To her utter dismay, the scent of gas lingers around her as she closes her fridge! This effect on her is ab....abhorra....argh, humiliating! Just the moment she had to take to come up with a word makes her feel insecure and helpless as she starts her moderate trot out of her tailoring shop.

The feeling of her plush midsection shaking, and the sudden, somewhat noisy spurts of gas, force her self-consciousness through the roof, but eventually she reaches her fellow elemental friend's library, the Golden Oaks. She rapidly knocks her hoof at the door, a lump gathering in her throat as she awaits Twilight's response. Thankfully she doesn't have to wait long before the door opens. "Oh! Good afternoon Rarity, what's the occasion?"

"Darling, I'm concerned I may have been hexed by a portly mare on my way home from gathering su - puh..." As soon as the lump in her throat vanishes, the floodgates are opened, and she braces her pride for its inevitable fall, slamming her eyes shut and turning away. And then, a nearly ear-shattering belch erupts from her maw, saliva flecking out and either hitting the doormat or dripping from her chin.

"BBRRAAAAAAP!"

Rarity pants softly in the aftermath, ears flattened against her skull as she refuses to look up at her friend.
1421.title: Lactose-induced intestinal discomfort (Gas)

choices: "The hex has no cure; only when it ends naturally will you stop."
"You will continue to fatten, but the other effects are on you."
14213.content:
Twilight closes the distance vetween herself and her guest, blushing a bright red as she comes to her side and pats her back. "Er, I'm sorry, 'impressive' probably isn't the right word, but regardless, don't worry. Want to come in for a bit of tea and a snack while I check up on your metabolism?"

Rarity opens her eyes, showing the mist in them as she's invited in. Before she can stop herself, she sits on her plush haunches and hugs Twilight around the neck tightly. "T-thank you darling, you are too kind...I'm just a complete mess today." As she walks inside the library, she lets out a soft fart that once again lingers behind her, trailing in the interior. She tries not to make a scene of it, tail tucked between her legs as she enters the study.

Twilight locks the door behind the two mares as she gets out a stethoscope and a few other monitoring tools, quickly getting to work on measurements. A minute passes before Twilight hums to herself, scrawling notes in a notebook before closing it. "Despite the gain, you seem to be okay so far. Before I ask for symptoms and cross-reference..." Her horn flickers before a kettle of tea, two cups, and a small plate of sugar cookies are brought in via teleportation. "There you go." She sets everything on her nightstand before sitting on her bed with a spellbook in magical tow, gesturing for Rarity to sit by her. "So, start from the beginning?"

By the time Rarity finishes explaining her mental blockage and gas, Rarity has chomped down each cookie, crumbs settled on her chest as she licks her lips and chin clean. Her belly is slightly more apparent as she sits, perhaps the mass of an apple now distributed around her stomach. "So...do you have any leads?"
14213.title: "Uhm...t-that was actually pretty impressiv...

choices: Go shopping for groceries for Rarity's new diet
Head straight home without disposing of her and Sweetie's emergency sweets
142132.content:
"Now, as long as you keep from getting too greedy , and you work harder to keep clean, you won't suffer any more adverse effects. Although..."

"Although? Rarity bites her lip before shifting in her seat, worrying more than before.

"Every effect you gain from slipping up is...permanent. Even after you've stopped gaining so much from eating, you'll always have trouble with a few technical words, and you'll always be...gassy."

Rarity lies on her belly, whimpering to herself as her middle protests slightly. "So in other words I'll be a dumb, gassy sow by the time it's all over..." She whines, lower lip trembling slightly. She drinks the last bit of tea in her cup, burping quietly to herself before looking up at Twilight.

"Noooo...c'mon Rarity, don't give me that look. I can't help you any further than disgnostics and being a general friend." Twilight's heart swells as Rarity gives a begging expression, a few seconds passing before Twilight tears her gaze away. "Okay, okay, fine. Would you like me to help you refrain from being greedy or lazy? I can have Spike follow you and help with that, or I could use a spying spell to keep tabs on your diet."

Rarity can't help but give her friend a great big bear-hug once more before they part.
142132.title: "You will continue to fatten, but the other...

1421322.content:
Twilight opens a small rift in her private study, big enough for her head to peer through if need be. On the other side is Rarity's workspace, somewhat cluttered given the nature of the job. As soon as the rift is opened, Rarity picks up her blueprints, taking her time to read the obnoxiously fancy writing she used for them. With a clear head and less frustration, she understands better, pulling out a new cut of her satin, slowly and carefully cutting everything out. Rarity smiles to the rift, thankful for Twilight's spying as she manages to get by more easily than earlier that day.

A few hours pass without any problems, and Rarity makes her personal dress - scrapping the corset for obvious reasons and instead opting to use stretchier fabric for her belly. Despite her experience, Rarity does have some sweat on her brow, wiping it off as she stands. Two quiet noises are heard as she does: the faint squeak of a dainty toot, and the more ominous gurgling of a hungry belly. "Uhm, say, Twilight, would you have any dietary recommendations? I should be okay as long as I don't make a mess, yes?"

A few seconds pass before Twilight replies, "Like I said, you can't prevent gaining weight, so just don't scarf it down or make a mess and the weight gained could be lost after the fact." As she says this, the rift shrinks slightly, due to the intensity of creating a rift in general. "Ah, is it okay if I leave you be for the night? My horn aches from the spell.."

Rarity frowns slightly, but understands, hopimg she can exercise some self control. "Alright dear, get your rest then. I think I'll follow closely behind you too. Goodnight, dear."

After the rift disappears, Rarity jogs her way downstairs, going to the kitchen just as before but hesitating. What could she eat? There are leftover daisy sandwiches from a picnic that week; a hefty carton of neopolitan ice cream in her freezer; or a few other options in her pantry.
1421322.title: Head straight home without disposing of her and...

choices: Has gotten lazier and dumber due to the TV
Has gotten gassier from the ice cream
14213222.content:
Rarity bites her lip. Surely this is as good an occasion as any to have her comfort food, right? All this stress and she won't be able to lose weight until a curse ends on its own goodness knows how far down the line...she picks up a tablespoon and the carton, returning to her bedroom and getting relaxed. She turns on her television, checking for soap operas and getting to the most recent episode of her favorite one before popping the lid.

Within minutes, Rarity is a sniffling, whimpering mess, the drama of the program too much for her to handle as she spoons another mouthful of pink ice cream. "Oh Glamour, why do your talents go so unnoticed among your f-friends? Don't they know how hard you work for their comp-panionship?" She sobs quietly, scarfing down a few more bites of ice cream. Despite trying to keep herself clean, the portly mare is stained from nose to chin in neopolitan delight, having had nearly half the carton before the melting started. Her white bedsheets and covers are stained with pink droplets as she tightly hugs the carton to her chest.

In her time eating, the poor girl has gained nearly ten pounds. Her belly rises and falls, but never quite recedes enough to pass for average, belly bloated with dairy and fur discolored. Mascara runs down her cheeks, and despite her best efforts at first, she still feels somewhat sluggish in the closing of her mouth, leaving a very slightly-pink drool spot on her chest.

As Rarity awakes the next morning, she...
14213222.title: Ice cream

142132221.content:
As Rarity lay in bed past noon the next day, a rift opens in her room, a concerned Twilight glancing around. The sounds of TV are faintly heard, and the bed is inhabited by a noticeably fatter Rarity clutching her empty ice cream carton like a foal keeping close to her mama. The streaks of mascara stain her cheeks, eyes practically glued shut, and the pink color is nigh-unwashable from her snout. There's a pang of pity in Twilight, but...something else as well. She gently clears her throat, blushing.

In response Rarity snorts softly, raising a leg and gassing her covers.

"Rarity...?" the nerdy mare asks, not getting a reply. "R-Rarity, wake up..."

"Idunwann'..." Rarity sniffles slightly, hugging the ice cream carton to her chest.

"Rarity...you did it again..." she states, in a more scathing tone and a slighy raised volume.

Rarity slowly stretches in bed, then rubs her eyes of mascara and tears, eyes slightly pink. "W-what did I do...?" As her crusted eyes manage to open her screams could be heard across the entire town.

Rarity sits in her shower, loudly sobbing to herself as she tries to wash the pink from her snout to no avail. Twilight, not wanting to take Rarity's privacy from her, instead comes to the boutique, sitting at the door to the bathroom. "Rarity...?"

"Guh - go away Twilight...I'm grotas....grote...g-gross..." She feebly demands, curled up in a fatty ball on the floor as she looks at the stains in her fur, the cellulite on her belly and flanks.

"Rarity...please open? I can help, really! Can we at least talk at the door?" Twilight frowns softly. A swelling in her chest reminds her that something is off about her feelings toward the gluttonous unicorn, but Twi fails to pick up on the reason, wanting to be there for her friend.

"I...I want to be al - hic! - alone, T-Twilight..."

Twilight unlocks the door with her magic, silently starting to open the door. The room is full of steam to the point Twilight couldn't see her if she squinted, so she silently walks to the door to her shower, leaning in. "What if I don't think you're gross? Would you still say that?"
142132221.title: Has gotten lazier and dumber due to the TV

choices: Twilight starts to help her along
Twilight tries to help her stop gaining/slobifying
1421322212.content:
A few seconds of silence pass before Twilight decides to continue. "I...I think you look cute the way you are...that's what I'm getting at. I hate seeing you cry, please come out? I'll help you clean your sheets."

Rarity snivels for a few more seconds before shakily sitting up on her haunches, feeling her belly pool over her waist. "....okay..." she whispers, shutting off the shower as the steam dissipates. "C-can I lean against you while we go downstairs?" She asks, wiping her eyes with her bathrobe sleeve before putting the outfit over her back.

"Of course, Rarity. Now let's wash your covers and get you up and running."

After they strip the bed, the two unicorns walk together to the laundry room and kitchen, Twilight making her friend some fresh sandwiches for lunch. Rarity stays quiet as she eats, nibbling at her food despite the loud gurgling of her belly. "Do you need anything else, Rarity?"

"I don't know...after my binge I just want to curl up and die in a corner."

"Oh, come on, Rarity. The stains really don't look bad! It looks pretty cute, that shade of pink..." Twilight gently rubs Rarity's belly as she eats, smiling gently. "Do you feel good after the shower?"

"Nnnh..." Rarity whines, squirming in her seat. Before she can ask Twilight to stop the rubbing, she lets out a quiet rumbling fart, blushing and silently closing her eyes.

Twilight leans up, pecking her cheek. "Whatever happens, you know the elements still care about you. Especially me."

14213222121.content:
As Twilight washes Rarity's plate, a napkin raises to the portly mare's face, wiping off crumbs. "I'm sorry for not checking in earlier Rarity. I hope it's okay that I didn't push you to wake up early. Though, if you want to keep up hygiene and health you may have to get out earlier for workouts and such. I can offer a treadmill for you, routine health checkups, whatever you want. Spike can handle Golden Oaks for however long it takes to get you on track."

Rarity shuffles a bit in place, staying in her chair as it groans slightly. "I...don't know if I can jog very well..."

"That's fine! We can walk together."

Rarity realizes she can no longer hide behind excuses, faking a meek smile. "Alright darling...just don't gawk at my tubby flanks when I do, okay?"

"Cross my heart and hope to fly. I'll get the equipment right away, okay? Don't have any more snacks while I'm gone, alright?" She smiles jokingly, patting Rarity's tummy.

"I'll stay right here, heh.." Rarity flushes, her cheeks brighter pink than her muzzle.

Twilight hums as she starts to fill a small cart with workout tools and a few health monitoring devices. She contemplates what plans she could enact to help Rarity along.
14213222121.title: Twilight starts to help her along

142132221211.content:
Twilight takes a few pit stops on her way through town, buying three hayburgers and some tacos, giggling deviously as she stuffs the food into her bags to hide in the fridge for later use. She stocks the drawer of the fridge before starting her equipment assembly in Rarity's bedroom. The treadmills are set side by side, and with some effort Twilight can rig the bed with the medical equipment, allowing Rarity to be lazy during checkins.

After finishing the remaining setup, Twilight approaches Rarity, who sits at the table after her sandwiches, seeming slightly hazy-minded and full. As cute as she is in her food-coma, she has to move a bit. "Alright Rarity, ready for a bit of walking on your treadmill? I have it right by the TV just so you can watch your dramas, and if you do a good job, I'll reward you for it!"

Rarity's expression makes her suspicion clear, but her belly gurgles as it digests rapidly. If she decides to eat soon she might still be hungry! Twilight smiles lovingly, taking Rarity's hoof and leading her upstairs.

Mere minutes later, Rarity wheezes softly, mouth hanging open as she walks on the machine. Twilight walks beside her, her casual demeanor a stark contrast to Rarity's desperate jiggling and panting and light slobbering. "Come on Rarity, only five more minutes and I'll give you your reward!" Twilight gently pats Rarity's back, feeling a stirring in her chest. The slob variant on the old carrot on a stick method will work wonders on Rarity as the curse worsens, no doubt.

Rarity collapses as her treadmill shuts off, lying on the surface as she feels her belly loudly groan in need. Twilight lifts Rarity with her magic, gently setting her in the bed (which still contains a few pink stains from the previous day's binge) and tucking her in. "I'll get your reward Rarity, good job."

Twilight returns with a burger, fresh(ly reheated) burger, holding a ball of napkins just in case Rarity decides to clean herself up. As Rarity pigs out, Twilight simply lies beside her sweaty, breathless form, rubbing her belly between gentle wipes to clean grease off her chest. Facial mess can stay though, Twilight thinks as she gingerly tests Rarity's heartrate and belly. Perfect~...
142132221211.title: Messy/greasy food as incentive/reward

info.brief_description: Rarity makes fun of a fat unicorn pony. Too bad this pony puts a curse on her...
info.description:
In this story, Rarity makes fun of a unicorn for her weight. This unicorn happens to know a slob spell that gives Rarity her just desserts. Here, I have a few rules set:

1. Anything slob-related could happen to Rarity.

2. She cannot like the transformation. At least not at first. She can be convinced to like it or hypnotized into liking it.

3. Keep Rarity and every other pony in character. Rule 2 applies to this, as well.

4. Rarity is the first pony who will gain. You can have other ponies gain if there's a good reason for it, but Rarity shall be the main focus.

5. OCs are not aloud. Sorry.

6. No blood and gore.

7. Scat is allowed but try not to overdo it.

8. No sex.

9. Swearing is allowed but don't overdo it. Basically, don't curse every five seconds or two words.

10. No death.

That's about it. Other than that, have fun everypony! ^_^

EDIT: Please add on to this. It's no fun having an interactive if you're the only one in it. Please try to add something when you view this, rather then check it out and leave? Thank you.

EDIT 2: Just for the record, Rarity is my favorite pony. I made this because of how much I like her.
